The tuita counsel now excerpts from the pronouncement of President Dilma. Watch on any open TV channel. #DilmaDaMulher
To speak to you women - my friends and my equals - is to speak with the heart and soul of our great nation. #DilmaDaMulher
News is useful, but not always enough. Often they confuse us more than they clarify us. #DilmaDaMulher
Conversations at home, and at work, must also be completed by data that is not always available to everyone. #DilmaDaMulher
I have information that if shared will help them to better understand the moment we spend and to renew faith and hope in Brazil!
Brazil is going through a different moment from what we have experienced in recent years. But he is not living a crisis in the dimensions that some say.
We are experiencing short-term problems, but our fundamentals remain solid. #DilmaDaMulher
Very different from those crises of the past that broke and paralyzed the Country. #DilmaDaMulher
Our people are protected in what is most important: their ability to produce, earn their income and protect their family. #DilmaDaMulher
The difficulties that exist - and the measures we are taking to overcome them - will not compromise your achievements. #DilmaDaMulher
Nor will they make Brazil stop or compromise our future. #DilmaDaMulher
The central question is this: we are in the second stage of the fight against the serious international crisis since the great depression of 1929 #DilmaDaMulher
And, in this second stage, we are having to use different and tougher weapons than the ones we used at first. #DilmaDaMulher
As the world changed, Brazil changed and circumstances changed, we also had to change the way we deal with the problems. #DilmaDaMulher
The circumstances changed because in addition to certain problems have worsened - in Brazil and in much of the world. #DilmaDaMulher
There is also the coincidence that we are facing the greatest drought in our history, in the Southeast and Northeast. #DilmaDaMulher
Among many serious effects, this drought has brought temporary increases in the cost of energy and some food. #DilmaDaMulher
Brazil has all the conditions to overcome these temporary problems. I ask you to join us. http://t.co/H1pwSHJjv7 #DilmaDaMulher
We want and know how to do this, distributing efforts in a fair and bearable way for everyone. #DilmaDaMulher
As always, especially protecting the working classes, the middle classes and the most vulnerable sectors. #DilmaDaMulher
We have deep commitments to the country's future and we will continue to adhere to these commitments in an unshakable way. #DilmaDaMulher
Brazil is laying the foundations to face the crisis and take a new leap in its development. http://t.co/jpdYydkv9S #DilmaDaMulher
For the first time in history, Brazil, faced with an international economic crisis, did not suffer a financial and foreign exchange loss. #DilmaDaMulher
The + important: while in the other countries there were mass layoffs, we here preserve and increase employment and wages. #DilmaDaMulher
If we get those victories before, we have everything to get new wins again. #DilmaDaMulher
Sometimes we have to control spending more to keep our budget out of control. #DilmaDaMulher
That's why we started cutting government spending, without significantly affecting priority investments and social programs.
We review certain distortions in some benefits while preserving the sacred rights of workers. #DilmaDaMulher
And we are implementing measures that reduce, in part, credit subsidies and also tax exemptions. #DilmaDaMulher
We are doing everything with balance so that we have as much correction as possible with the least possible sacrifice. #Woman's Day
The measures will be tolerable because besides being a government that cares about the population, we have a stronger people today than ever before.
Brazil now has more professional qualification, more infrastructure, more opportunities to study and more entrepreneurs. #DilmaDaMulher
Fiscal effort is not an end in itself. It is just the crossing for a better time, which will arrive fast and even more lasting.
We will not betray our commitments to the workers and the middle class (...)
(...) nor let their conquests and their rights disappear. #DilmaDaMulher
We are not taking these measures to return to being equal to what we have already been. But, yes, to be much better. #DilmaDaMulher
During the time that lasts, the Country will not stop. On the contrary, we will continue to work, produce, invest and improve. #DilmaDaMulher
Along with the new measures we are maintaining and improving our programs. Delivering great works. #DilmaDaMulher
Brazil has learned to practice social justice, as well as hard to apply the hand of justice against corrupt. http://t.co/xbYPeKytm3
Finally, I want to announce a new step in strengthening justice, in favor of Brazilian women. #DilmaDaMulher
I am going to sanction the Law of the Feminicide that transforms into heinous crime the murder of women. http://t.co/BKkSIq4LpP # Beijing20 # IWD2015
With this, this heinous crime will have much harder penalties. http://t.co/BKkSIq4LpP # Beijing20 # IWD2015 #DilmaDaMulher
With concrete and courageous measures, in all areas, we will, together, improve Brazil. It is a joint task of every society.
We need to transform difficulties into solutions, temporary problems into permanent advances. #DilmaDaMulher
Brazil is bigger than all of this and has often shown the world how to do better and different. #DilmaDaMulher
More than ever, it's time to believe in our future. To dream. To have faith and hope. #DilmaDaMulher
Long live the Brazilian woman! Long live the Brazilian people. Long live Brazil! #DilmaDaMulher
Pronunciation by #DiaDaMulher https://t.co/hGit8UXqYd #DilmaDaMulher

Today, I chaired a meeting of the Council of Ministers at the Presidential Palace in Abu Dhabi, during which we adopted a new system for the promotion of any health products in the UAE http://t.co/pBbAt27UfZ
During the meeting, we stressed the importance of firmness in the control of health products in the State and ensure that they conform to international standards before being marketed to the public
We also adopted today a set of unified financial policies and regulations for government agencies to enhance transparency and efficiency in dealing with public funds
Today, we have joined the International Transport Forum as well as a number of air transport agreements with several countries to strengthen our global position in the transport sector

Today I chaired cabinet meeting at Presidential Palace in Abu Dhabi. We adopted new system regulating promotion of health products in UAE
We stressed importance of strictly monitoring health products to make sure they adhere to international standards prior to marketing to public
We adopted federal government's 2015 consolidated financial procedures guidelines for more transparency & efficiency in dealing with public funds
We approved joining International Transport Forum and several air transport agreements to strengthen our global position in transport sector

It is a very important moment in affirming the struggle that focuses on violence against women. # LawFeminicide
We are affirming here the importance of fighting violence, both intolerance and prejudice. # LawFeminicide
The numbers shock us and show Brazilians subjected to an unacceptable violence that happens in all social classes. # LawFeminicide
We have an obligation to combat this violence that originates in intolerance, prejudice and the macho culture. # LawFeminicide
Brazil can never accept being the land of intolerance and prejudice, the seed of the worst feelings and ideologies.
Machismo is an evil to be fought because it discriminates, humiliates, mistreats, harasses and, in the limit, kills. # LawFeminicide
This law that I sanctioned typifying feminicide is a historical act. # LawFeminicide
The fact of being qualified as heinous will impose on its perpetrators a prison sentence without mitigating factors. # LawFeminicide
There are Brazilians who see this law as an exaggeration, they consider excessive laws that punish racists because they think there is no racism in Brazil.
They think that homophobia is not a relevant problem. They disagree with the law that punishes domestic violence because they think it is the subject of husband and wife.
This view of the world is not real and we do not accept it. Unfortunately there is still racism in Brazil. #Feminicide Liquid
Unfortunately there is violence against LGBT people in Brazil, due to prejudice and intolerance. #Feminicide Liquid
In a fight between husband and wife, he plows, yes, especially in case of violence. # ReadFeminicide
The Brazilian State should, yes, put the spoon and society in the same. # LawFeminicide
We have a network of prevention and support for women victims of violence. # LawFeminicide
When we treat the woman as the protagonist, we want to empower her, to have a full life. # LawFeminicide
It is very important to transform the situation of women in Brazil, because in doing so we are transforming the life of the nation much better.
Do not accept violence as inevitable, do not allow physical force and machismo to destroy your dignity. Report it! #Feminicide Liquid
Dilma ends by paying homage to Rosângela Rigo and Lourdinha Rodrigues, who contributed a lot to the struggle of the women, who died in an accident in February.
Women are not half of society but of society as a whole. She is the mother, wife, sister and daughter. She is our colleague, teacher, educator and role model
